attributes.action: help the Isle of Wight community protect the provision of services by the Riverside Centre, based in Newport on the Isle of Wight, from a funding crisis proposed by the local authority.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Around 100 service users and providers at the centre have been told funding cutbacks, totalling around £110,000, could be on the cards and rent demands from the council could be £120,000 — a fifth of the centre's income.

This will put the future of an invaluable community resource under threat of closure which will have knock on implications for the many other small community organisations that rely on the centre to facilitate their own work.

We urge central government invention, in what could be a catastrophic loss to some of our island’s most vulnerable individuals.
